name: Dark Whispers (Kreateer)
description:
Description

Dark Whispers is a roguelike dungeon crawler where the Player finds themselves trapped within a maze-like dungeon where their only enemy are the shadows lurking in the dark.
With only a small torch to stave away the darkness, the Player must navigate the dungeon in hope to find an exit out of the wretched place...

DISCLAIMER: The game is currently missing a lot of planned content due to a severe lack of time for proper development, but will be added within the two-week extension period. As it stands now, the game is playable, but there is nothing for the Player to do.

How to Play

This game can be played with a Keyboard or with a Gamepad.

Keyboard: WASD to move, Esc (or click on button) to Pause
Gamepad: Left Analog to move, Start Button to Pause

Credits

Dungeon tileset by https://0x72.itch.io/
